description:
Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) Emulator!  Relive all the classics, and discover new ones!  Countless hours of entertainment.   Play the greatest games of all time--on the go!  Best of all, it's FREE!!  Supports most games, except some that use special hardware.  NOTE: You need to provide ROMs for this software to be useful.
Works with many games, fast emulation!  Features: Customizable controls, onscreen skins (including transparent ones), save states, autosave, frameskip, fullscreen stretch, scaling filters, optimized emulation core, dedicated developer!  Not all games work, particularly those that use special chips.  Consult wiki or email me if you have any questions (webos@wdtz.org).
Based on 'Snes9x' and 'DrNokSnes' (my deepest thanks and appreciation to the authors of those applications!).
Please remember that the reviews section is for reviews, not support (no way to contact you if you ask for support in a review!).
If you liked this app, please consider purchasing VisualBoyAdvance from the catalog!  This helps fund future development.
Finally: **HAPPY GAMING!**
